Name: Chain Event
Desc: More than one event takes place

Name: Population Up
Desc: Population increases based on the amount of people in the faction

Name: Population Down
Desc: Population decreases based on the amount of people in the faction

Name: War Declaration
Desc: War is declared on an opposing faction, factions can be destroyed or wounded from this.

Name: Famine
Desc: Famine in which there is a high chance for a city to be wiped out.

Name: Discovery
Desc: Chance at discovery based on intelligence
